alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 7:33AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 7 and 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Deer Park, Hayden, Northport, Orin-Rice Road, Springdale-Hunters Road, Eastport, Potlatch, Flowery Trail Road, Priest River, Plummer, Metaline Falls, Post Falls, Chewelah, Newport, Davenport, Ione, Athol, Coeur d`Alene, Airway Heights, Spokane Valley, Kettle Falls, Rockford, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Tiger, Fruitland, Genesee, Worley, Fairfield, Sandpoint, Bonners Ferry, Colville, Moscow, Clark Fork, Metaline, Cheney, and Downtown Spokane. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes on Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle
